page.title: 13Employment in Moy
page.content:
Most working people have to go outside Moy for employment. Those who live and work in Moy are involved in either Forestry or Estate work. Those coming into our study block are Jackie_the_Post, the joiner/metal worker at the steading and a forester. The population also consists of housewives and retired people.
GROCER'S VAN _ Tuesday Friday DUSTBIN COLLECTION _ Wednesday MILK _ Monday Wednesday Friday PAPERS _ Monday_Saturday LIBRARY VAN _ every 2nd Tuesday COALMAN _ Monday 2nd Thursday CHURCH of SCOTLAND _ every 2nd Sunday
